meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11158 Highway 146 North in Hardin, Texas, as the “Lucas Lowe Memorial Post Office”.

main.name: HR1250

content.p: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11158 Highway 146 North in Hardin, Texas, as the “Lucas Lowe Memorial Post Office”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 11158 Highway 146 North in Hardin, Texas, shall be known and designated as the “Lucas Lowe Memorial Post Office”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the “Lucas Lowe Memorial Post Office”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
